channel.title: 2020/08 on Vanessa Correia's Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in 2020/08 on Vanessa Correia's Portfolio

item.title: What is `this` all about?
item.description: this is a JavaScript keyword that refers to the object it belongs to. However, it has different values depending on where it is used. Let’s break this down so as to fully undertand what is is, where and why it is used and why the scope of it plays an important rule.
